__e: It's people with very violent behavior. They kill without reason.
I was told they were violent and dangerous and had to be kept isolated, so they wouldn't get loose and kill us, which is exactly what they did, but we brought it on ourselves.

I'm sitting thinking about all the things, and it's hard for me to explain all at once, but I can tell you this. It was the most chaotic and, uh... violent and dangerous situation that I've ever seen in my life.
